definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4
containing_words.word: 中国人民政治协商会议

definition: consultative conference (political venue during early communist rule)/consultative meeting/deliberative assembly

sentences.english: Fourth, solve problems through consultation on an equal footing, instead of imposing restriction at will.
sentences.chinese: 通过平等协商解决问题，不要动辄设限和制裁。

sentences.english: He called for negotiationson a “win-win solution”.
sentences.chinese: 他呼吁协商达成“双赢的解决方案”。

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: Tense negotiations were under way in the State Department conference room.
sentences.chinese: 在国务院会议厅里，正进行着激烈的协商。

sentences.english: The customer and developer negotiate a fixed price for the project.
sentences.chinese: 客户和开发人员协商项目的固定价格。

sentences.english: Sai Sheng Murng, deputy spokesman of the Shan State Army-South, supported the call for a Panglong-type conference.
sentences.chinese: 南掸邦军副发言人宰盛蒙，支持召开彬龙型协商会议。

sentences.english: Serious negotiations on a two-state solution are in all their interests.
sentences.chinese: 对两国的解决方法进行认真的协商对他们都有利。

sentences.english: The development of the Eleventh General Programme of Work benefited from extensive consultation.
sentences.chinese: 深入的协商，推动了制定第十一个工作总规划。

sentences.english: About the matters not covered in this agreement, both parties shall settle through friendly consultations.
sentences.chinese: 本协议如有未尽事宜，由甲乙双方友好协商解决。

sentences.english: Zhang Xiaomei, a member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, supports reform.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民政治协商会议委员张晓梅支持改革。

sentences.english: In handling major matters, the president shall consult with the vice-presidents.
sentences.chinese: 总经理处理重要问题时，应同副总经理协商。

sentences.english: When negotiating with your top, make sure he is willing and able to abide by Rule One.
sentences.chinese: 与你的支配者协商时，确保他能够也愿意遵守规则一。

sentences.english: Reference to the actual costs, NG scheduled consultations.
sentences.chinese: 费用参照实际情况，协商仪定。

sentences.english: Second, promote democracy and conduct extensive consultation.
sentences.chinese: 第二，要发扬民主，广泛协商。

sentences.english: I'd like to negotiate about the distributional plan with you.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意与你协商一下分配方案。

sentences.english: All deputes in connection with or in the execution of this Contract shall be settled friendly through negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 有关或执行本合同的一切争议应通过友好协商解决。

definition: to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
to mediate/to bring parties to an agreement
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
